post.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new PSD with options to create individual layers, generate new renditions or save as PSD. To get status of this job, call the 'Get Status' endpoint.

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://image.adobe.io/pie/psdService/documentCreate \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer $token' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-api-key: $x-api-key' \
  --data '{"options":{"document":{"height":1000,"width":1000,"resolution":72,\
 "mode":"rgb", "fill":"transparent","depth":16},\
 "manageMissingFonts":"useDefault","globalFont":"MyriadPro-Bold",\
 "fonts":[{"href":"get_presigned_url","storage":"external"}],\
 "layers":[{"name":"new adjustment layer","type":"adjustmentLayer","visible":true,\
 "adjustments":{"brightnessContrast":{"brightness":-23,"contrast":15}}},{"name":"new content layer",\
 "type":"fillLayer","visible":true,"fill":{"solidColor":{"rgb":{"red":0,"green":255,"blue":255}}},\
 "blendOptions":{"opacity":90,"blendMode":"normal"}},{"locked":false,"name":"SO Layer",\
 "type":"smartObject","visible":true,"input":{"href":"files/input/Simple.psd","storage":"adobe"},\
 "smartObject":{"linked":false}},{"type":"textLayer","name":"my text layer","locked":true,"visible":true,\
 "bounds":{"top":50,"left":100,"width":500,"height":450},\
 "text":{"content":"NEW TEXT CHANGES",\
 "characterStyles":[{"fontSize":12.5,"fontName":"Arial-BoldMT",\
 "orientation":"horizontal","fontColor":{"rgb":{"red":26086,"green":23002,"blue":8224}}}],\
 "paragraphStyles":[{"alignment":"left"}]},"blendOptions":{"opacity":90,"blendMode":"normal"}},\
 {"name":"New Exposure Layer","type":"adjustmentLayer","locked":false,"visible":true,\
 "adjustments":{"exposure":{"exposure":0.25,"offset":0.0049,"gammaCorrection":1.38}}},\
 {"type":"adjustmentLayer","name":"Color Balance","locked":false,"visible":true,\
 "mask":{"input":{"href":"files/abc.psd","storage":"adobe"},\
 "enabled":false,"linked":true,\
 "offset":{"x":70,"y":50},"clip":true},\
 "adjustments":{"colorBalance":{"shadowLevels":[0,10,20],"preserveLuminosity":true,"midtoneLevels":[30,40,50],\
 "highlightLevels":[60,70,80]}}},{"name":"new Image layer","type":"layer","visible":true,\
 "input":{"href":"hget_presigned_url","storage":"external"}},\
 {"type":"adjustmentLayer","name":"Hue Saturation",\
 "locked":false,"visible":true,"adjustements":{"hueSaturation":\
 {"channels":[{"channel":"master","hue":-5,"saturation":20,"lightness":0}],"colorize":false}}},\
 {"type":"backgroundLayer","locked":true,"visible":true,"name":"Background"}]},\
"outputs":[{"href":"put_presigned_url","storage":"external",\
 "type":"image/jpeg","width":500,"trimToCanvas":false,\
"layers":[{"id":77}]},{"href":"put_presigned_url","storage":"external",\
 "type":"image/vnd.adobe.photoshop"}]}'
